welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Easttown! Known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A spacious terminal with a wide selection of dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A busy terminal with many international flights and duty-free shopping.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A smaller terminal with a focus on regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The newest terminal with state-of-the-art amenities and a variety of international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.
